Title: Requires street pricing for pre-packaged food and beverage items sold by vendors at certain transportation facilities and on toll roads
Summary: Requires street pricing for pre-packaged food and beverage items sold by vendors at certain transportation facilities and on toll roads; defines street pricing; provides that vendors may be subject to civil penalties not to exceed five hundred dollars per violation.
LawCode: Add ยง24, Transp L; add ยง20-a, Hway L; add ยง390, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, the highway law and the public authorities law, in relation to requiring street pricing for pre-packaged food and beverage items sold by vendors at certain transportation facilities and on toll roads
